title: Terrifying and anxiety inducing
review: I found the film to be extremely hard to watch so much so I had to stop halfway and finish it the next day. This film excels at inducing anxiety in the viewer. The film has a lot of negative energy which is hard to process, averting the viewer from enging in the themes presented in the movie. I found the film terrifying and can comfortably say it's one of those films which is too negative to ever watch twice.

title: Underrated film
review: One of the best film I've ever watched, definitely in my top 10 and definitely underrated.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Worst Tarantino film by far.
review: Worst Tarantino film by far, prepare yourself to be sorely disappointed.

title: Perhaps one of the worst films I've ever watched
review: Perhaps one of the worst films I've ever watched. You have to have an IQ of a toad to enjoy this film. The best part of the film was that it was only one and a half hours long so I didn't have to endure this catastrophe of a film for too long. You literally can't watch 1 minute of this film without running into a plot hole.
